vlive.korean: 근데 색깔이 이렇게 변해서 어떻게 생각해요? But what do you think about my new hair color? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : STAY 안녕 ~ 🐥🐱
vlive.english: But what do you think about my new hair color?

vlive.korean: 마음 변해서 나가라고 하기 전에 빨리 살펴보자. Let's look around before he changes his mind. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : 악동탐정스 시즌2 10화 <궁궐애사 추리공방 Ⅳ>
vlive.english: Let's look around before he changes his mind.

vlive.korean: 갑자기 마음이 변해서 올라갈 수도 있잖아요. One day, she might want to do that. 듣기 View video V Animal Family : 케이윌이 고양이를 사랑하는 법, 해리&테리의 건강검진 w/ 박정윤수의사 Cat health checkup & massage
vlive.english: One day, she might want to do that.

vlive.korean: 최근에는 뭐... - 너무 많이 변해서. - 네. Recently... - So much has changed. - Yes. 듣기 View video 셀럽티비(Celuv.TV) : 칼군무, 퍼포먼스! B.A.P 함께 HANDS UP!
vlive.english: Recently... - So much has changed. - Yes.

vlive.korean: 그래서 약간 붉게 변해서 딸기 우유로 정했습니다. So I had blushed a bit, so I chose strawberry milk. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : HIGHTEEN - 하이틴 '바른말~고운말~'
vlive.english: So I had blushed a bit, so I chose strawberry milk.

examples.korean: The landscape has been radically altered, severely damaging wildlife. 발음듣기 자연 경관이 급격히 변해서 야생동식물들에게 극심한 피해를 주고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The landscape has been radically altered, severely damaging wildlife. 발음

examples.korean: Caterpillars change into butterflies. 발음듣기 애벌레는 변해서 나비가 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
He had altered so much I scarcely recognized him. 발음듣기 그는 너무 많이 변해서 내가 못 알아 볼 뻔했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had altered so much I scarcely recognized him. 발음

examples.korean: He had changed to such an extent that I no longer recognized him. 발음듣기 그는 너무 변해서 내가 더 이상 알아보지 못할 정도였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He had changed to such an extent that I no longer recognized him. 발음

examples.korean: My friend Josh always gets belligerent when he’s drunk and gets into fights. 발음듣기 내 친구 Josh는 술 마시면 항상 적대적으로 변해서 싸움에 휘말려. DARAKWON
examples.english: My friend Josh always gets belligerent when he’s drunk and gets into fights. 발음
